text: Simón Alonso Ramírez Cuevas (born 3 November 1998) is a Chilean professional footballer who plays as a defender for Universidad de Concepción in Primera División de Chile. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Concepción, Chile Category:Chilean footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Huachipato footballers Category:Chilean Primera División players Category:S.L. Benfica B players Category:Belenenses SAD players Category:LigaPro players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Chilean expatriate footballers Category:Chilean expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal
title: Simón Ramírez (footballer, born 1998)
